name: Nancy Pelosi
title: Former Speaker of the House
summary: Nancy Pelosi speaks with a measured, controlled delivery style, precise pronunciation, and methodical cadence that emphasizes policy points with occasional hand gestures for emphasis.
bio: Nancy Patricia Pelosi is an American politician who served as the 52nd and 54th speaker of the United States House of Representatives from 2007 to 2011 and again from 2019 to 2023. She has served as a U.S. representative from California since 1987.
